segments.advisor_message: Alright, let’s take a look at your current living situation. Can you let me know if you own or rent your property?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, I was saying I own it, right? Actually, I think I was rentin' it before, but I bought it recently.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! And what's the address of the property?
segments.client_message: Oh! It’s, um, 5 Elm Street, Springfield, but I... I keep forgettin' the post, uh, postal code. I just moved in like, uh, two months ago, you know?
